CardData.FlavorText: Mirkwood is an implacable foe impossible to defy. It wears down all who would venture within its dark and twisted confines. You and your companions are no different. Though you have all drawn upon the full measure of your abilities, it is not enough. Exhaustion has sapped your very will.

Localization.Title: Beyond Weary
Localization.Text: Exhaust a random Hero through the end of next round
